txt.en:
'Segar has perfected the art of cave-claw training to the point where we've had nearly no accidents this season!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Use a Trained Cave-claw by entering the Treasure Field and using the item in your inventory. The cave-claw will sniff out the nearby dig-sites and lead you to the best one he discovers.

Cave-claws are consumed on use.</rgb>
How do I use a Trained Cave-claw?
